title: French Navy ‘Opens Fire’ at Five Drones Spotted Over Submarine Base
description: The Île Longue naval base in Brittany, France, home to the French Navy’s four ballistic missile submarines, was overflown by as many as five small drones on Dec. 4, 2025. French news organisations Le Monde and Agence France-Presse (AFP) have said an investiga…
content: French news organisations Le Monde and Agence France-Presse (AFP) have said an investigation has been launched by authorities following the incursion into highly restricted and sensitive airspace. Co… [+7027 chars]
